abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column offers recipe for spicy Thai pork tenderloin salad.
lead_paragraph: The dish is so pungent and bright that the meat’s main job is to meld its own gentle flavor with the other ingredients. (Article plus video.)

headline.print_headline: Love Me Tender, Love Me Spicy
